content: unleash your creativity with our pack of maker mini skeins perfect for crafting adorable amigurumi each vibrant color is designed to bring your handmade creations to life start your next project today materials bernat® maker minis™ kit includes 10 balls 50 g/1 7 oz each 500 g/17 6 oz total yardage 58 m/63 yds each 560 m/610 yds total note 1 kit will make all 3 versions version 1 contrast a cream 1 ball or 35 yds/32 m contrast b red 1 ball or 4 5 yds/4 m contrast c orange 1 ball or 7 5 yds/7 m
